name: Lenovo 83B40001US
specs: Ideapad 1i 15.6" Full HD Touchscreen Laptop  -  Intel Core i5 - 1334U  -  16GB Memory  -  512GB SSD  -  Abyss Blue

full_specs.Product Name: Ideapad 1i 15.6" Full HD Touchscreen Laptop - Intel Core i5-1334U - 16GB Memory - 512GB SSD
full_specs.USB Ports: 1 x USB-A 2.0, 1 x USB-A 3.2, 1 x USB-C 3.2

all_reviews.title: Excellent IDEApad
all_reviews.body:
It was open box and excellent as advertised. I did my research before purchasing and this one checked all the boxes.  The delivery was as scheduled.

I just received it yesterday and so far, so good.

all_reviews.title: It’s a pretty big Bang for your buck!!!
all_reviews.body: I love this Lenovo for the price you get quite a bit of features and memory not to mention 12 Gb of RAM

all_reviews.title: Good Budget Friendly
all_reviews.body: It last for a long time and loads quick for research purposes, good budget friendly computer. Base is slightly flimsy when you push on it, cheaper build but works great!

all_reviews.title: Great value for the price/performance/features
all_reviews.body: It is a great laptop for the price, although not all the features I would've liked (like backlit keyboard or Thunderbolt port).  Not a showstopper, still a great home laptop and has a distinct keypad, that a lot of folks seem to like in a laptop keyboard.  Good value!

all_reviews.title: Great Performance at a Great Price!
all_reviews.body:
I’ve been using the Lenovo Ideapad 1i for a few weeks now, and I’m really impressed with the overall value. The Intel Core i5-1334U processor and 16GB of RAM handle multitasking smoothly—I can stream, browse, and work on documents without any lag. The 512GB SSD makes boot-up and file access super fast.

The 15.6” Full HD touchscreen is crisp and responsive, which makes navigating and working much easier, especially when I’m not using a mouse. The Abyss Blue color gives it a premium look and stands out from the usual silver or black options.

Battery life is solid, and it’s light enough to carry around easily for school or work. I’d highly recommend this laptop to students, remote workers, or anyone looking for a reliable, budget-friendly option with great performance.

all_reviews.title: Great overall laptop
all_reviews.body: This is a great computer.  It is not an HP, which is great. Horrible Product is what I call them.  Lenovo has done well with this feature packed laptop. It has everything you need including touch screen, i5, not i3.  16 GB of RAM, not 8.  Those features add up, making this a great value priced, but plenty of computer power for an average user.

all_reviews.title: Great thin laptop! Great Price!
all_reviews.body: Great laptop for the price. Purchased to use at work. Do not use for heavy duty work but for the price it does exactly what I need it to do. Really like it. Screen is clear and sharp. Machine even though just an i5 still very fast for web views, excel and word type things. Even use with gotoassist for client tech support and no issues.

all_reviews.title: Great computer for the money
all_reviews.body: Met my expectations plus some.  The touch screen is a great feature.  I bought this for my wife and she loves it.  The speed is perfect for what she needs.  Having a Lenovo Ideapad for work, this is my first Lenovo purchase and I am not disappointed.

all_reviews.title: Good Budget laptop
all_reviews.body: Great laptop for the price, loads fast, does what i need

all_reviews.title: Great Purchase
all_reviews.body: This computer has ben great.  It is very fast and downloads quickly. I have it connected to my WIFI and consistently get over 300Mbps download speeds. I highly recommend this Laptop Computer.

all_reviews.title: Daniel’s review
all_reviews.body: Laptop has worked excellent so far all programs have ran smoothly so far and battery durability has far exceeded my expectations. As of now I am pretty delighted with my purchase.

all_reviews.title: Laptop Review
all_reviews.body: Didn’t need bells and whistles, just a good laptop to run my budget spreadsheets on…this Lenovo with the Intel I5, 16G RAM and 512G SSD, did the trick and at a good price!!!

all_reviews.title: has everything you need at a good price
all_reviews.body: bought this laptop for my son. He use it to study and play games. It is fast and doesn't lag. its at the top with performance at a good price.

all_reviews.title: Good PC
all_reviews.body: This was exactly what I was looking for. Maybe not the fastest laptop even though it's works great for me.  I am not a gamer, so it does eactly what I needed.

all_reviews.title: Satisfied User
all_reviews.body:
This computer works great and was bought at a great price. 
Im very thankful for the sale on this item.

all_reviews.title: Nice laptop for daily use
all_reviews.body: Very good product from Lenovo, no problems, does all the basic function. The sales person in Bestbuy had also helped to make this purchase.

all_reviews.title: Satisfied
all_reviews.body: We bought this for our small business and it has exceeded our expectations.easy to use and just what we needed for just the simple use of Microsoft office and Internet for email.

all_reviews.title: So far, so good
all_reviews.body: So far, so good. Runs multiple tabs efficiently, powers up quickly, battery hasnt failed me yet.

all_reviews.title: Lovin It!
all_reviews.body: Fast and responsive. Plenty of storage space and very light weight

all_reviews.title: Great!
all_reviews.body: My son got one for Christmas and we loved it so much that we got one for us, too!

all_reviews.title: New laptop
all_reviews.body:
Works well. Speed is acceptable.
Love the touch screen.
Great product for the money

all_reviews.title: Great laptop
all_reviews.body: Does everything I needed to do. I’m really excited to continue to use this product.

all_reviews.title: Eat your heart out Apple
all_reviews.body: Lenovo all the way - clean look, durable, and has great accessories. Will buy from them again.

all_reviews.title: Good computer, good price
all_reviews.body: Excellent for the price. Works well, good for the purpose intended (writing, communication).

all_reviews.title: Review
all_reviews.body: Great computer for the price !  Just started using it and does everything I need it to do.

all_reviews.title: Awesome value
all_reviews.body: Very powerful at this price point. Great battery life.

all_reviews.title: Review
all_reviews.body: Very good product very happy with the brand excellent

all_reviews.title: Great value
all_reviews.body: Good quality computer.  Lightweight, fast, good graphics.  Great value for the money.

all_reviews.title: Laptop life
all_reviews.body: It’s a good computer for the price. It works great for what I needed it for. Projects with the kids that helped to keep them inquisitive and learning and exploring.

all_reviews.title: Review
all_reviews.body: Excellent and would recommend this brand every time.

all_reviews.title: Troy G
all_reviews.body: The laptop is Great! My son really enjoyed the speed

all_reviews.title: Love item
all_reviews.body: Purchased for grandson going to colloge.  Perfect for what he needed.

all_reviews.title: Works ok so far
all_reviews.body: Overall, everything appears to be working so far. However, in my opinion the setup process isn't that great. Too much focus on having a Microsoft account.

all_reviews.title: Affordable Laptop for Work and Personal Needs
all_reviews.body: Great affordable laptop for work and personal needs. Initial use seems to be going well.

all_reviews.title: Great Performance and Touchscreen Quality
all_reviews.body: Smooth performance, great screen, and solid value for money.

all_reviews.title: Lenovo
all_reviews.body: Great buy! Much faster, has I-PAD OPTION of additional keyboard.

all_reviews.title: Happy with my buy.
all_reviews.body: Good Cistomer Service, excellent product. Happy with my buy.

all_reviews.title: Lenovo Ideapad
all_reviews.body: This is a nice laptop, and it runs smoothly.  For the price, I couldn't ask for more.  I just wish that it was available in gray.

all_reviews.title: Great product
all_reviews.body: Very easy to use and fast for getting work things done.

all_reviews.title: Fast processor
all_reviews.body:
Perfect gift for teenagers.
Great value and price.

all_reviews.title: Slim
all_reviews.body: Very light to carrying and good price for i5 with full hd

all_reviews.title: Great so far
all_reviews.body: Excellent so far. Bought it so my daughter could play Sims 4, and so far no issues.

all_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
all_reviews.body: Excellent purchase..would suggest a friend to buy this laptop

all_reviews.title: Great features and price!
all_reviews.body: It is great for the price. Definitely does what I need it for.

all_reviews.title: Good Buy
all_reviews.body: Bought for a client. Was easy to setup and perfect mixture of power, speed and performance at a great price.

all_reviews.title: Don't recommend for students
all_reviews.body: Laptop is good but the infrastructure feels cheap and it runs pretty slow. Can't handle much - do not recommend for students
